top_projects.name: Aura-Text
top_projects.description: Aura Text is a versatile and powerful text editor powered by QScintilla that provides all the necessary tools for developers. It is build using PyQt6 and Python.

top_projects.name: AnimeSnap
top_projects.description: Unlock a world of anime information from a single scene screenshot – Including episode, timestamps, and much more!

## 👋🏻 More About Me
- 🙋‍♂️ Currently 18 years old - 🌱 I’m currently learning web development - 💬 Ask me about Python(Tkinter & PyQt6) - 📫 How to reach me: rohankishore746@gmail.com - 🧑🏼‍💻 Hire me via Fiverr by clicking on the button at the top of this page - 🗃️ Carrd: https://rohankishore.carrd.co/
## ⛏️ Languages, Frameworks & Tools ![Python](https://img.shields.io/badge/python-3670A0?style=for-the-badge&logo=python&logoColor=ffdd54) ![PyQt6](https://img.shields.io/badge/Pyqt6-%2319a463.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=PyQt6&logoColor=white) ![Tkinter](https://img.shields.io/badge/Tkinter-%2313233a.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=Tkinter&logoColor=white) ![C++](https://img.shields.io/badge/c++-%2300599C.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=c%2B%2B&logoColor=white) ![Figma](https://img.shields.io/badge/figma-%23F24E1E.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=figma&logoColor=white) ![Canva](https://img.shields.io/badge/Canva-%2300C4CC.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=Canva&logoColor=white) ![Github](https://img.shields.io/badge/GitHub-%231b1b1b.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=GitHub&logoColor=white) ![Git](https://img.shields.io/badge/Git-%23b22d47.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=Gitb&logoColor=white) ![InnoSetup](https://img.shields.io/badge/Inno Setup-%238eb9dc.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=PyQt6&logoColor=white) ![CMD](https://img.shields.io/badge/CMD -%23000000.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=CMD&logoColor=white) ![PyCharm](https://img.shields.io/badge/pycharm-143?style=for-the-badge&logo=pycharm&logoColor=black&color=black&labelColor=green) ![Visual Studio](https://img.shields.io/badge/Visual%20Studio-5C2D91.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=visual-studio&logoColor=white) ![MySQL](https://img.shields.io/badge/mysql-4479A1.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=mysql&logoColor=white) ![NumPy](https://img.shields.io/badge/numpy-%23013243.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=numpy&logoColor=white) ![Matplotlib](https://img.shields.io/badge/Matplotlib-%23ffffff.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=Matplotlib&logoColor=black) ![Windows](https://img.shields.io/badge/Windows-0078D6?style=for-the-badge&logo=windows&logoColor=white) ![ChatGPT](https://img.shields.io/badge/chatGPT-74aa9c?style=for-the-badge&logo=openai&logoColor=white)
## 🧑🏻‍💻 Featured Projects ### GUI Based (PyQT6 and Tk) 1. [Aura Text](https://github.com/rohankishore/Aura-Text) : IDE made with PyQt6 and QScintilla 2. [Youtility](https://github.com/rohankishore/Youtility): Youtube video/playlist downloader with a modern fluent design and options to download audio/subtitles 3. [ZenNotes](https://github.com/rohankishore/ZenNotes): Notepad alternative with TTS, Translations, etc 4. [Spotifyte](https://github.com/rohankishore/Spotifyte): Spotify track/playlist downloader with a modern fluent design 5. [CashFlow](https://github.com/rohankishore/CashFlow): Finance manager app with Expense and Income tracking 6. [AnimeSnap](https://github.com/rohankishore/AnimeSnap): Get details of an Anime like the episode, timestamp, etc from just its Screenshot 7. [cvGen](https://github.com/rohankishore/cvGen) : CV Generator using PyQt6 and Python. Create beautiful CVs easily 8. [Graphyte](https://github.com/rohankishore/Graphyte) : Math graphing app like GeoGebra made with PyQt6, NumPy and Matplotlib 9. [Tempus](https://github.com/rohankishore/Tempus): Calendar with Horoscopes, TODOs, Reminders and much more 10. [QRGen](https://github.com/rohankishore/QrGen): Custom QR Code Generator with Logo and color support 11. [WiFi-Analyzer](https://github.com/rohankishore/WiFi-Analyzer): Network sniffer with built-in saved passwords viewer 12. [WinCalc](https://github.com/rohankishore/WinCalc): Windows Calculator clone made with Tk ### Other Projects 1. [PhysiPy](https://github.com/rohankishore/PhysiPy): Python library to solve Physics equations 2. [Dash](https://github.com/rohankishore/Dash): An endless runner with Cyberpunk theme 3. [PasteCMD](https://github.com/rohankishore/PasteCMD): CLI App for Pastebin 4. [Plotium](https://github.com/rohankishore/Plotium): Python library to plot chemical trends like Electronegativity, Atomic Radius, etc 5. [QoolTabs](https://github.com/rohankishore/QoolTabs): PyQt6/PySide6 TabWidget with drag and drop support and customizable context menu

rohankishore/Veridian.summary: Recent activities in the Veridian repository have focused on updates to the README.md file, project completion, and study projects. Multiple push events have occurred, including updates to the repository's master branch, with commits addressing various aspects such as templating, theming consistency, and cleanup. The repository has seen significant activity, with numerous push events in a short span, indicating ongoing development and refinement.

rohankishore/Aura-Text.summary: The Aura-Text repository has seen recent activity centered around fixes, updates to the About section, and the integration of the StrGenie plugin. Several push events have been logged, including merges with the main branch, resolving conflicts and updating the plugin. These activities suggest that the repository is being actively maintained and improved, with a focus on enhancing its functionality and user experience.

rohankishore/AuraText-Plugins.summary: Activity in the AuraText-Plugins repository has been centered around the addition of the StrGenie plugin and string manipulation capabilities. Although the number of push events is fewer compared to other repositories, the focus on specific plugin development indicates targeted efforts to expand the functionality of related projects, such as Aura-Text, by providing additional tools and features.

profile_summary: I'm Rohan Kishore, an 18-year-old aspiring Python developer from Kerala, India, with a strong foundation in Python, HTML, and GUI development using PyQt6 and Tkinter. With 77 followers and 29 public repositories, I'm actively engaged in the development community, constantly learning and exploring new technologies. My projects, such as Aura Text, Youtility, and ZenNotes, showcase my skills in building user-friendly and functional applications, demonstrating my passion for coding and problem-solving.
